response.original_title: How Long Is Long Enough: The Excessive Sentencing of Quntos & Layla
response.overview: In a robbery where no one was physically harmed, the victim and the vehicle were returned safely, and a total of $301 was stolen, do the perpetrators deserve life in prison without parole? Well, that’s the sentence Layla Roberts and Quntos Wilson received in 1995 at the ages of 18 and 19…
response.title: How Long Is Long Enough: The Excessive Sentencing of Quntos & Layla
